plates.name: BURRITOS
plates.headline: Wrapped with freshness
plates.description: Hearty, hand-rolled, and packed with flavor. Each burrito is filled with a balanced blend of rice, beans, creamy guacamole, and your choice of meat—wrapped up warm and ready to fuel your day.

plates.name: TORTAS
plates.headline: Mexican-style sandwiches
plates.description: Our tortas are built on toasted, golden bolillo rolls layered with creamy guacamole, your choice of juicy, slow-cooked meat, and topped with crisp cabbage and house-pickled onions. Every bite hits that perfect balance of rich, tangy, and fresh—comfort food with serious flavor.

plates.name: PLATES
plates.headline: Complete meals with our premium ingredients
plates.description: Our plates come loaded with your choice of tender, seasoned meat, served alongside hearty beans and rice. Each order includes three fresh, handmade tortillas and a crisp topping of shredded cabbage, pickled onions, and fresh cilantro for the perfect bite of flavor and balance.

plates.name: QUESADILLAS
plates.headline: Melted to perfection
plates.description: Craving something simple and satisfying? Our quesadillas are grilled to golden perfection, packed with your choice of flavorful meats and stuffed with melted cheese. Served with a fresh green salad on the side—it’s the kind of balance you didn’t know you needed.
